name: atlas-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server that enables LLMs to manage complex task hierarchies with dependency tracking, status management, and rich metadata support. Provides ACID-compliant storage with caching and batch processing capabilities.

scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run start"
scripts.tree:
echo '# atlas-mcp-server
' > repo-tree.md && node --expose-gc scripts/generate-tree.js >> repo-tree.md
scripts.postinstall: node --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=4096 --eval "console.log('Atlas MCP Server installed successfully. Run npm run build to compile, then restart the MCP Client.')"

author: cyanheads
